meanings.definition: To remove or lessen bruises on (something)
meanings.sent1: She carefully debruises the fruit before serving it.
meanings.sent2: After the fall, he debruises his knee with a cold pack.
meanings.sent3: The magic potion instantly debruises any bumps and bruises.
meanings.sent4: Her smile has the power to debruise even the darkest of days.
meanings.sent5: The healing ointment debruises the skin, leaving it smooth and clear.

meanings.sent1: Using a gentle touch, she debruises the ripe avocado.
meanings.sent2: The ice pack helps debruise the swollen ankle.
meanings.sent3: He debruises the overripe banana, making it look fresh again.
meanings.sent4: Her kind words debruise his wounded heart.
meanings.sent5: The repair cream debruises the damaged leather, restoring its original color.
